results.name: Triangle read by rows, A100861(n,k) * A118930(k).
formula: Triangle read by rows, A100861 * (A118930 * n^(n-k)) = M*Q. M = A100861 as an infinite lower triangular matrix and Q = a matrix with A118930 as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
